title: BugSplat
body: When I go to click on League to start to play I get a bugsplat message. I then try to close Bugsplat but then the League client opens back up and I get a bugsplat message yet again. I can only play if I run administrator but I would like to know how to fix this

replies.body: This is likely being caused by Discord Overlay.  Disabling that should do the trick, but let me know!
